This is a line of text! This is the intro to the article, really. Actually, above this we should probably have a photo or something. I’m not sure if that will be the default style for every post or what, but it would be nice to use a great photo at the top of everything.

This is another line here. I’m not sure if it is going to break for me automatically, but it is worth checking. I’ll add another couple lines here so I can see what it is like with a decent amount of copy. The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog. That dog sure is lazy!

A Sub Headline

It seems to make sense to use H3s (or H2s, we’ll see) for the sub heads. H1s should be reserved for the post title, I think. So this is what it is like to use an H3. And here is another sentence so you see how it is.

<?php 
    echo 'this is some php'; 
    $i = 25;
    $v = $i + 22;
?>
  • Item

This is another nice H3

In this case, I’m using an H2, and I’m also putting another line between my headline and my copy. Here is another sentence so we have enough copy. I’m not going to mention that lazy dog down here.

That should do it! I could figure out strong markdown stuff (as I will need a refresher in all markdown) - but for now, this is good!
